solution_code: public class Solution {--newline--    --newline--    ListNode head;--newline--    Random random;--newline--    --newline--    public Solution(ListNode h) {--newline--        head = h;       --newline--        random = new Random();        --newline--    }--newline--    --newline--    public int getRandom() {--newline--        --newline--        ListNode c = head;--newline--        int r = c.val;--newline--        for(int i=1;c.next != null;i++){--newline--            --newline--            c = c.next;--newline--            if(random.nextInt(i + 1) == i) r = c.val;                        --newline--        }--newline--        --newline--        return r;--newline--    }--newline--}--newline--
